TopicTitle: Possible Multiplayer mod using Kerbal Konstructs

Articles.Content: Recently I've been wondering about how multiplayer could be incorporated in KSP and i thought KK could be used to help. The mod could be used to add the function to claim bases so one person at a time could use it so runways aren't clogged. It may also help with lag by putting one person at the KSC and another person in another place, meaning physics are unloaded on the other persons craft which would help with lag. Then later someone could make a mod that uses BD Armory to have sides for a war which would be interesting. If this idea is already a thing please tell me and if it isn't could someone work on that because that would be the best.
